reviews.review_msg: VERY PROFESSIONAL. AMAZING KNOWLEDGE. CARES ABOUT STUDENTS.
One of best professors I have ever had. Great mentor. Cares about students.
She is a brilliant woman, She is "old school" and has high expectations for her students. Buckle down and do the work you will be amazed at how benificial her course is.

This is the WORST POSSIBLE PROFESSOR you could get!!! Avoid her like the plague!!! She is unhelpful and has no willingness or desire to teach its absolute shame she has the title professor.. If you want someone to teach you something don't attend her class she only passes people who she "likes" complete favoritism and has a bias opinion.

This is the worse prof I've ever had!  (Avoid having her prof by all means!!!)  The prof comes unprepared for every single class and the class is very unstructured.  In fact, she doesn't even seem to understand the basic questions students ask reflecting the assigned readings!!!  Difficult to find her expectations as her instructions are vague.

She talks about how important feedback and criteria are but she fails at both! Every week I would leave class just furious!! If you're not in PDP you don't have enough background and I've been told by those in PDP that this class didn't help them at all!

Most frusterating prof Ive ever had. Always late but locks late ppl out of classroom; clarity isnt b/c of accent, she simply cant expain the subject clearly.  always interrupts student questions; doesnt see any way but her way. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS WITH HER. assignments: regurgitated the textbook. Marking: unable to defend her marking decisions.

worst teacher ever. Rude, mean, and unreasonable. Stops entire class if someone is late, eating, or she can't figure out her computer problems. If I wanted to read a book out loud in class, I would have takent his course in distance ed. Ironic that she's teaching "classroom assessment" when she's the worst teacher ever! AVOID THIS CLASS!!!

The problem here is that she is a POLI-SCI person not an EDUCATION person - so you go in thinking you will learn about evaluation in education and you look more at corporations and companies... she is often unprepared - late - lacking materials for class - she definately picks favourites quickly.

I remember that class and it was full of a bunch of whiny babies who liked to monopolize conversations. Geva-May was an excellent professor in every way. She is extremely accomplished and I'm sure these kids were just not used to recieving instruction from a world class academic. The theory was most likely too confusing for those poor comments.
This was one of the worst education classes I have taken. She was never prepared, and was never around for extra help. She broke every ethical code in the book. Avoid at all cost
Terrible, a scourge to teaching.  She would pack her purse 45 minutes before class was over!  She was all like "in Israel I'm the top...blah blah blah..."  Awful professor.

This instructor treated students with a lack of respect and was very unhelpful. She was also chronically unprepared for class. Different students were told different things. Avoid taking a course from this professor if you can.
One of the most helpful classes I took at U.  Emphasizes student participation and accoutability. Great theory. One of my favorite teachers.

I learned absolutely nothing, the theory she based the whole class on was laughable, she was utterly useless. I got a good mark, but that was only cause she liked me. VERY VERY BIAS! She picks favourites.
Terrible. Made no sense. Did NO work. showed up for an hour (of a 4 hour class), totally unwilling to help with anything. Avoid her at all cost.
